# recovery sig

verify sig and recover signer address.

## API

```
http://localhost:3000/recover?msg=<msg>&sig=<sigBytesHex>
```

note: raw sig is a json string. covert it to bytes then hex string (without 0x prefix).



## run

```
$ npm run start
msg:  0x5d0000000c00000055000000490000001000000030000000310000009bd7e06f3ecf4be0f2fcd2188b23f1b9fcc88e5d4b65a8637b17723bbda3cce80114000000dc3ff72c77f90a034b69b593f6b339ced1d85de88fd374e799010000
sig:  
{"signature":"0xb286e3099df24fcc907aa75acd968c9ed8b1121c709e117e642490015ac7844b7ec2af9bf009575128d32097f36fa7bff78bd9ef7e3dbb50796eae70d21fa02000","identity":"0x033c158382c249e79fde591ac3542afc08395fdf0e3ca73587958cbe446d431a6d","signType":"CkbSecp256k1"}
is verified:  true

```

```
$ curl "http://localhost:3000/recover?msg=0x5d0000000c00000055000000490000001000000030000000310000009bd7e06f3ecf4be0f2fcd2188b23f1b9fcc88e5d4b65a8637b17723bbda3cce80114000000dc3ff72c77f90a034b69b593f6b339ced1d85de88fd374e799010000&"
{"address":"ckt1qzda0cr08m85hc8jlnfp3zer7xulejywt49kt2rr0vthywaa50xwsqwu8lmjcalepgp5k6d4j0mtxwww68v9m6qz0q8ah"}
```
